label: Users
attributes: id; name; email; password; email_verified_at; remember_token; two_factor_secret; two_factor_recovery_codes; two_factor_confirmed_at; created_at; updated_at

label: Admins
attributes: id; name; username; email; password; email_verified_at; created_at; updated_at

label: Settings
attributes: id; terms_conditions; contact_help; company_profile; created_at; updated_at

label: Categories
attributes: id; name; slug; created_at; updated_at

label: Products
attributes: id; name; description; category (string); stock; price; images (json); variants (json); weight; length; width; height; discount_price; discount_percent; discount_active; discount_start; discount_end; created_at; updated_at

label: Order Statuses
attributes: id; name; description; created_at; updated_at

label: Orders
attributes: id; user_id (FK); status_id (FK); total; order_date; buyer_name; buyer_phone; buyer_address; tracking_number; created_at; updated_at

label: Order Items
attributes: id; order_id (FK); product_id (nullable); product_name; product_image (nullable); price; quantity; created_at; updated_at

label: Cancellations
attributes: id; order_id (FK); reason (nullable); cancellation_date; initiator; decision (nullable); created_at; updated_at

label: Return Orders
attributes: id; order_id (FK); reason (nullable); return_date; photo_path (nullable); video_path (nullable); decision (nullable); created_at; updated_at

label: Transactions
attributes: id; order_id (string unique); amount; status; snap_token (nullable); created_at; updated_at

label: Discounts
attributes: id; code; description; amount; start_date; end_date; created_at; updated_at

label: Personal Access Tokens
attributes: id; tokenable_type; tokenable_id; name; token; abilities (nullable); last_used_at; expires_at (indexed); created_at; updated_at

label: Sessions
attributes: id; user_id (nullable, indexed); ip_address; user_agent; payload; last_activity

label: Password Reset Tokens
attributes: email; token; created_at

label: Cache
attributes: key; value (text); expiration (int)

label: Cache Locks
attributes: key; owner; expiration

label: Jobs
attributes: id; queue; payload; attempts; reserved_at; available_at; created_at

label: Job Batches
attributes: id; name; total_jobs; pending_jobs; failed_jobs; created_at; cancelled_at

label: Failed Jobs
attributes: id; connection; queue; payload; exception; failed_at

label: Pegembalians
attributes: id; created_at; updated_at

label: Table Name
attributes: id; created_at; updated_at
